text: Mu by’ukuri, mufite icyitegererezo ku matsinda abiri yahuriye ku rugamba (rwa Badri); rimwe rirwana mu nzira ya Allah irindi ari irihakanyi. (Abahakanyi) babonaga ku maso (abemeramana) babakubye kabiri. Ariko Allah atera inkunga ye uwo ashaka. Mu by’ukuri, muri ibyo harimo isomo ku bashishoza
